TopicTitle: Custom on-screen message activated through part, staging, and/or action groups

Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that enables you to add a custom message that will display in-game whenever any part (or part function) is activated, either through staging or through action groups?

Say I have a full experiment suite on a probe, and linked them all to the custom action group '1' then also an Experiment Storage Unit on the custom action group '2.' I want to see something like "Experiment Suite Activated" when I press 1. Wouldn't be much need for a custom message for the ESU, unless I have more than one on the craft, in which case knowing exactly which one just collected all applicable science might be useful as the message would differentiate between one and the other.

In conjunction with Kal1000 controllers, maybe a way to display screen messages whenever a certain relative or absolute position is reached on the controller track.
Whenever I make a propeller-driven craft, I usually have a the torque max out at 25% main throttle, RPM max out on 50%, and anything above that is used to tweak the propeller's angle of attack to get better thrust at higher speeds. Having the game display a message upon reaching any of those points would be nice.
Being able to confirm ISRU status over a whole base without having the right click on processors and drills would be nice too. 

The message editor must be available from the VAB/SPH at the very least, and possibly in-flight too.
You could probably make a part and edit it to have a few (or many) pre-recorded messages which could be activated via action group, so that only one such part would be needed per vessel. Bit of a duct-tape tier solution, though.
